== Mankada (627493) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Mankada is a village in the [[Perinthalmanna]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 3106 hectares and harbouring 6530 households with total population of 32748 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Perinthalmanna]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 15599 and female population is 17149. Scheduled Caste Population is 2786 and Scheduled Tribes population is 129. Census Location Code of the village is 627493<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 26931 (82.24%)
* Literate male population: 12841 (82.32%)
* Literate female population: 14090 (82.16%)
